mapper.select:
SELECT rownum rownum_, gt.id_ grantid, gt.debt_code, gt.grant_code, gt.iou_code, gt.currency, gt.business_types, CASE gt.business_types WHEN 'PT0501000000' THEN '有追索权' WHEN 'PT0502000000' THEN '无追索权' END recourse, m.m_currency, m.solution_amt, m.project_name, user_.account_, user_.user_name, protype_.name_ product_name, dept.dept_name, dept.code_ DEPT_CODE, cone.cust_no coneno, cone.cust_name_cn conecn, CASE cone.finance_platform WHEN '1' THEN '是' WHEN '0' THEN '否' END finance_platform, cone.cust_scale conescale, cone.organization_code coneorgnum, cone.credit_rating conerat, prop.cust_no propno, prop.cust_name_cn propcn, prop.cust_scale propscale, prop.organization_code proporgnum, prop.credit_rating proprat, CASE interest.trade_finance_business WHEN 1 THEN '政策性贷款项下贸金业务' WHEN 2 THEN '与政策性贷款支持方向相同的贸金业务' WHEN 3 THEN '非政策性业务' END trade_finance_business, CASE interest.policy_attributre_classify WHEN '1' THEN '一带一路' WHEN '2' THEN '国际产能和装备制造合作' WHEN '3' THEN '重大装备出口和高新技术出口' WHEN '4' THEN '对外承包工程和境外投资' WHEN '5' THEN '能源、资源类' WHEN '6' THEN '中国制造2025' END policy_attributre_classify, CASE interest.syndicated_status WHEN 1 THEN '牵头行' WHEN 2 THEN '参与行' END syndicated_status, '是否与他行银团放款' AS syndicateLoan, rental.biz_rental_factoring_code, rental.leasehold FROM BIZ_DEBT_GRANT gt LEFT JOIN BIZ_DEBT_MAIN m ON (m.enable_ = 1 AND m.debt_code = gt.debt_code) LEFT JOIN SYS_DEPT dept ON gt.institution_code = dept.CODE_ LEFT JOIN SYS_USER user_ ON user_.id_ = m.bank_tell_id LEFT JOIN BIZ_PRODUCT_TYPES protype_ ON gt.business_types = protype_.CODE_ LEFT JOIN BIZ_INTEREST_RATE interest ON (interest.enable_ = 1 AND interest.debt_code = gt.debt_code AND interest.grant_code = gt.grant_code) LEFT JOIN BIZ_RENTAL_FACTORING rental ON (rental.enable_ = 1 AND rental.debt_code = gt.debt_code AND interest.grant_code = gt.grant_code) LEFT JOIN (SELECT pts.cust_no, pts.cust_name_cn, renkey.debt_code, renkey.finance_platform, cust.cust_scale, cust.organization_code, cust.credit_rating FROM BIZ_RENTAL_FACTORING_KEY renkey, BIZ_PTS pts, BIZ_CUST cust WHERE pts.objtyp = 'BIZ_RENTAL_FACTORING_KEY' AND pts.objinr = renkey.id_ AND pts.rol = 'CONE' AND pts.ptyinr = cust.id_) cone ON (cone.debt_code = gt.debt_code) LEFT JOIN (SELECT pts.objinr, pts.cust_no, pts.cust_name_cn, cust.cust_scale, cust.organization_code, cust.credit_rating FROM BIZ_PTS pts, BIZ_CUST cust WHERE pts.objtyp = 'BIZ_DEBT_MAIN' AND pts.rol = 'APPT' AND pts.ptyinr = cust.id_) prop ON (prop.objinr = m.id_) WHERE gt.enable_ = 1
AND gt.grant_code = #{grantCode}
